data.title: PyMsOfa: Python package for the Standards of Fundamental Astronomy (SOFA) service
data.name: PyMsOfa
data.description: a Python package for the Standards of Fundamental Astronomy (SOFA) service

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "If this doesn't work, please install [TDM-GCC](https://jmeubank.github.io/tdm-gcc/download/)."

"This package is a Python package for the Standards of Fundamental Astronomy (SOFA) service of the International Astronomical Union (IAU). It implements the python package PyMsOfa for SOFA service in three ways" (indicates a Python module/package, i.e., a library dependency).

"PyMsOfa is a Python module for accessing the International Astronomical Unionâ€™s SOFA library from Python. SOFA ... is a set of algorithms and procedures that implement standard models used in fundamental astronomy." and "This Python package can be suitable for the astrometric detection of habitable planets ... and for the frontier themes of black holes and dark matter related to astrometric calculations" (shows it directly performs scientific/astrometric computations used in research).
